name: BALL! ZOMBIE! WAR!
description:
STORY:

At the beginning of time there were only two kinds (types) of creatures: balls and zombies. Zombies could get the power by sucking life out of balls. The balls started the war with zombies so they could safe themselves. In the end zombies were driven into space. The war wasn't over though. Every 100 years zombies are coming to the Earth to take one of the representatives of The Balls to their spaceship and then arrange A WAR OF BALLS AND ZOMBIES! 

You have several types of weapons:

Sword

Standard weapon with you forever

Uzi

The rate of fire of this gun is enviable!

Grenades

Good luck that the zombies took them to their ship!

Circular saw blade

Apparently there are carpenters among the zombies!

Red barrels

No space adventure can do without them!

Controls:
Arrow keys: Move
Left mouse button: Attack
